channel.title: What would people want in a pk server?
channel.description: I am bringing my old server scottish scape again. Although i dont have no-ip i would like many people to join it. What would all of you like to see in a good pk server?? :o

item.title: What would people want in a pk server?
item.dc:creator: @bartiscool22 bartiscool22
item.description:
@bartiscool22 wrote:

They want everything other people having.

(Everything which is leeched)
Thats what they do with Jorsa and GodsPkz/KingShits.
Bbut Jorsa is the most worse one, the source pwns but the type Pimp leeched of Jorsa is beep.

Read full topic
